lender.name: Radiology Network
lender.loan_because: radRounds Radiology Network hopes to donate its resources and funds to entrepreneurs and organizations (NGOs and non-profits) that aim to improve global health.
lender.occupational_info: radRounds Radiology Network is a radiology and medical imaging professional network for building relationships in clinical practice, education, career, research, and industry. We thousand of medical imaging professional and physician (radiologists) members. radRounds.org is our non-profit social venture arm which runs this KIVA page and is dedicated completely to supporting and raising venture funds to help improve access to quality care, availability of low-cost medical imaging technologies abroad, and effectively to improve global healthcare delivery.

lender.name: International Radiology
lender.loan_because: We aim to improve access to quality care, availability of high-tech medical imaging in regions needing critical diagnostic imaging services, and to effectively aid in the practice of medicine abroad in resource poor settings. We support all individuals and organizations who also share our passion for improving healthcare and are interested in medical imaging technology.
lender.occupational_info:
We are a nonprofit organization providing radiology interpretation and imaging expertise to humanitarian medical organizations as well as physicians in developing world. Our group is comprised of subspecialized academic radiologists, radiology residents and fellows, other healthcare professionals and imaging technologists.
We offer:
* Interpretation of radiology studies obtained by humanitarian medical organizations and medical missions. * Interpretation of radiology studies for physicians requiring primary reading. * Secondary consultation on studies obtained and reviewed elsewhere. * 3D reconstruction or imaging modifications such as for surgical planning. * Education of imaging related topics.

lender.loan_because: I love knowing how far money can go with Kiva.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I believe that I am fortunate to live in the society that I do and that wealth is based on the backs of other less fortunate societies so I owe some responsibility. In the past it has been difficult to assist other than through religious groups who all push their own agendas.
lender.occupational_info: Aoteroa/New Zealand was isolated from the rest of the world until only about 1000 years ago when the first people (Tangata Whenua or Maori) arrived. Europeans did not discover it until 300 years ago. Before people there were no mammals and many birds had filled that role and nested on the ground and many were flightless. There were relatively few plant species. Since settlement, especially white (Pakeha) colonisation, many animals and plants have been brought here. Many have become serious pests (there are now as many 'weeds' as there are native plants!). My job is in pest control administration. We try to minimise the effects of pests on our ecosystem and identify new pests and attempt to eradicate them before they spread. I work for a regional council.

lender.occupational_info: I work in Procurement, negotiating good deals for my company and meeting a variety of suppliers and internal partners on a daily basis. I am responsible for the Asia-Pacific region.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Finical assistance for a documentary about the decline of mental health care. Currently in production, Combo #3 Madness in America (form name: A Call For Help) is a feature documentary about the decline of mental health care funding in America.
lender.occupational_info:
Slashed mental health budgets are shattering and fracturing communities coast to coast. Taxpayer dollars are being diverted to correction. The result is needless suffering and heavy tax burden, with little hope of solving the mental health crisis in our country. But there is hope.
Recently the Denver Post March 5th, 2009 reported in an article entitled: Global Economy Takes Toll on Mental Health Care. (AP) The World Health Organization warned that the financial global crisis will probably worsen the situation of mental health care.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: God loans me everything I have--“Tell them to use their money to do good. They should be rich in good works and should give generously to those in need, always being ready to share with others whatever God has given them. By doing this they will be storing up their treasure [in heaven] as a good foundation for the future, so that they may take hold of real life.” 1 Timothy 6:18-19

lender.name: Grupo Estudiantil LLI
lender.loan_because: Somos un grupo de estudiantes del español en Austin, TX, adultos de la tercera edad en asociación con Lifetime Learning Institute. Contamos con muchas aventajas y muchos recursos, y nos gusta apoyar los esfuerzos y talentos de nuestros vecinos del sur con préstamos.

I worked with many people who grew up in poverty in Central America, and I have memories of the people I saw in the Balkans and Iraq. I want to give others the opportunity to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the past and learning how to be an archivist, a keeper of important papers.

lender.occupational_info: Clients come to me who are seeking to relieve physical or emotional pain. Or because they feel stuck in some way. By integrating massage, energy balancing and shamanic healing practices in my sessions I seek to empower others to heal themselves.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I think it is very difficult to own a small business and it inspires me to see people with initiative and entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a technology company as their east coast and international sales representative. I work in New York City and I make presentations to companies in the city and over the phone to companies internationally. I also travel for work to different countries for events. The type of companies that use the technology I sell work in the advertising and TV commercial production industry.

lender.name: Bill & Rebekah
lender.loan_because: We love this way of helping to improve quality of life for others in the world. So little can do so much in many cases. We have committed to keep reinvesting and add a little bit more each Christmas season to help others reach financial independence.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been blessed with the means to make small loans to others and I really believe it can make a dramatic difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the construction industry as a Pile Driver. I install deep and heavy foundations for large buildings and bridges, and shoring for deep excavation to protect other structures and utilities.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: there's so many people with less...and helping people is important.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because:
A man was walking along a coastline covered with thousands of dying starfish that had been stranded by the falling tide. He came across a woman walking in the opposite direction, picking up starfish and throwing them into the ocean.
"Why do you bother?", he asked her. " There are so many of them! You can't possibly throw back enough to make a difference."
The woman picked up another starfish, threw it into the ocean, and replied, "I made a difference to that one".

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world." If everyone felt this way, we'd all be neighbors helping neighbors. Everyone needs a helping hand now and again and this is not a hand out.....it's a hand up....I like that!!

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in the life of someone else. I want to reach out and touch someone that I would not have been able to other wise.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info:
I help plan how to put software together the same way a architect plans how to make a building.
But then I help build it too!

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: We live very well in the US and I believe that others can benefit from my help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Spanish language interpreter in a clinic for migrant farm workers.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to be more productive, doing what they can do to contribute to their communities

lender.name: Tine
lender.loan_because: We should all share if we can. And Kivas work makes it possible to contribute where people wants to make a better life through their work.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to translate from sign language to Norwegian or English, and also the opposite way. : )

lender.name: Ding Fleet
lender.loan_because: We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and want to help people all over to succeed and feel the thrill of standing on their own two feet.
lender.occupational_info: We're web marketing professionals designing new, inventive ways for the world to learn about your business. We lend to Kiva because we are passionate about small business owners.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: No one every made it on their own, we all need help.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I believe in that the poor always pay back! And I think this little lend will helping them very much, and make difference in there life.
lender.occupational_info: I feel very lucky being a knowledge worker, love to improve my skills and proud of my work.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: self help is much better than charity - adding ability to take control leads to self-respect and confidence. Empowerment displaces passivity and brings equity to the equation.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for leaving things a little better than we found them. This is in my sphere of influence and I find the opportunity to make a real impact in someone's life compelling.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: This is the most fantastic idea I've ever come across.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in media and communications. I provide the voice behind tv commercials, phone system, animations, etc.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: isabel
lender.loan_because: I can, and is needed
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a job, or better jobs

lender.name: Devon
lender.loan_because: i am a middle class north american kid; one of the richest demographics in the world. In addition to that, i often take the money, opportunities, and resources surrounding me for granted. this is totally unfair considering the level of poverty others live in, so this seems like the least i can do
